Methodology

How We Estimate OpenAI

OpenAI does not disclose token volumes. Unlike ByteDance and Google, OpenAI has never published daily or monthly token consumption figures. All estimates are derived indirectly.

Method 1 â€” Revenue back-calculation: With ~$12B+ ARR (2026 est.) and blended API pricing of ~$2/M tokens, the API portion generates ~6.8T tokens/day. Add ChatGPT consumer usage (~12T/day estimated from ~400M MAU Ã— avg session tokens).

Method 2 â€” Epoch AI compute proxy: Epoch AI's infrastructure analysis estimates OpenAI's total inference compute at levels consistent with ~15-20T tokens/day. We adopt their midpoint.

Method 3 â€” API call volume: At ~500M API calls/day with average ~15K tokens/call = 7.5T. Plus ChatGPT consumer = ~19T total.

Key uncertainty: OpenAI's pricing varies 100Ã— across models (GPT-4o mini at $0.15/M vs o1 at $15/M). Blended price assumption is the dominant source of error. Range: 12-25T/day.
